data.title: Great Service!
data.text: A big thanks for all the hard work of Ray the omelette maker and Jill who worked in breakfast! They are both awesome! Make sure to say hi to them!

data.title: Amazing!!
data.text: Food alone was amazing, but the friendly waitress topped it off. She went above and beyond to satisfy our needs and talk about local attractions. Then we forgot our to go box she brought it up to the room! This was on the first Saturday in September. The bbq flatbread melts in your mouth!

data.title: five days were enough to introduce us to many level of badness
data.text: Would recommend you find other restaurants in the locale- there are many nearby Most items were very heavily breaded with heavy paste. Avoid at all costs

data.title: Yum
data.text: Food excellent, service top notch, never a poor meal in over  3 years.  Free breakfast wonderful, ample and organize.  Dinner delicious with menu of many choices.

data.title: Titu is amazing
data.text: I had the French onion soup and it was great!! It is always such a pleasure to see Titu, his customer service skill set is excellent.

data.title: Good for Hotel Grub
data.text: Due to not wanting to leave the hotel for dinner, I ate at the Riparian. The staff was nice but not real fast. The bbq chicken flatbread was very good. I wouldn't necessarily go here if it wasn't at the hotel, but I've definitely had a lot worse.

data.title: You Da Man Shameen!
data.text:
Riparian Grille is located on the lower level of the Embassy Suites on Crooks Rod., in Troy, MI.  The restaurant has significantly better food than most hotel restaurants which often times isn't a meaningful comment.  The salmon entre, we all agreed, was one of their best dishes by far.  We got so bold as to order off the menu items and all were well executed.

Better than most hotel food - and never had to leave.  And don't forget to ask for Shameen and Renae - great service guys!  You made my day!!

data.title: great meal
data.text: Hot and good food... each member of family had something very different and all were cooked to order and were testy... very nice atmosphere and relaxing meal for the family.

data.title: Limited variety
data.text: limited selection of wines and what to eat. decent service, reasonable but not good enough. Food/wine selction needs improvement

data.title: Disappointing
data.text:
Maybe my expectations were too high, but in the Embassy Suites, I expected better service and food. I do know that there were staffing problems, so they may have been doing their best. The wait staff was nice, but inexperienced, having been pulled off their normal jobs, so maybe the kitchen chefs were also. Service was irratic.
The appetizers were good, but late. The Caprise salad was good too. The fish with parmesean topping was too old for , partly raw and partly over-cooked, so maybe partially under lights to keep warm too long cooked it further. My son-in-law is a chef, so it was painful for him to see the mess they had made of the dishes. The vegetables were great - al dente. The white chocolate cheesecake on Oreo crust, was not on Oreo-s, but rather a dark, dense chocolate substitution. That was a large portion, as was the chocolate chiffon cake, which my daughter, a dark, dense chocolate- lover said was superb. The third dessert was the apple pie one, which was smaller than the price should indicate, but delicious.
We had an infant with us, so fast service would have been appreciated, but instead two hours later we paid the check and departed.

data.title: Great lunch!
data.text: I had lunch here with 7 coworkers after we checked into the Embassy. We actually arrived at the restaurant close to their closing time. They agreed to stay open as long as necessary to serve us. I thought that was great customer service! The food was good. I had the chicken kabobs and two glasses of wine. The service was great and we were in and out quickly to enjoy the rest of our day!

data.title: Restaurant food in embassy suites
data.text:
If you enjoy bar type food, then this restaurant is for you.  Pizza, chicken wings can be found with a good salad variety and real foods like two fish choices and even red meat.  I wanted a veggie burger -no such luck-  so I enjoyed a Michigan cherry salad and cheesy French onion soup. The potato skins were almost my choice, but diet considerations  and my conscience won out.
Service was good, but the highlight was that each booth had a flat screen, so I had my choice of about 30 channels to accompany my meal!  Great as I was traveling alone.

data.title: Late night munching
data.text: Our group enjoyed the Managers Reception and sat in the comfortable lounge chairs chatting and visiting. We weren't really hungry enough to warrant a full dinner so we all had a few appetizers to end our evening....very tasty and fresh.

data.title: Muito conveniente
data.text: O restaurante está dentro do hotel embassy suites na cidade de Troy-MI e para quem está no hotel sem carro alugado é uma ótima opção!

data.title: Klassische Auswahl zu fairem Preis
data.text: Als Hotrelgast des Embassy Suite macht man nichts falsch wenn man keine Lust hat in ein anderes Restaurant zu gehen und einfach im Hotel isst. Standard-Auswahl bei guter Qualität und fairemPreis.
